data.content:
adjective
US or Brit enamoured
[more ~; most ~] :in a state in which you love, admire, or are very interested in something or someone
the movie star's enamored fans
usually + of or with
I became completely enamored of [=fascinated with] the island and its people.
He was enamored with her [=in love with her] from the day they met.
She is less than enamored with her new job. [=she does not like it]
